WorkPlace.Name: Adecco
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

HiringOrg.Name: Adecco
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: New opportunity as a Financial Controller at one of the biggest international shipping companies!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a highly motivated, experienced, and proactive Financial Controller for a 3 months temporary position with possibilities for an extension. The position offers good opportunities to develop your skills within both day to day accounting and reporting, Tax filing and similar job tasks.

Job tasks:

  • Assist setting up accounting structure
  • Day to day accounting and reporting
  • Tax filing
  • Follow up on Actual vs. Budget
  • Creating financial statements and the month-end/year-end close process
  • Handling invoices

We are looking for someone who:

  • Has experience with the above mentioned job tasks
  • Is result-driven, wellorganized and shows attention to details
  • Has experience with working in a challenging, fast paced and changing environment dealing with a lot of different tasks at the same time

Information:

  • Location: Copenhagen V
  • Fulltime, 37 hours pr. week

Does this sound interesting to you? Then we look forward to receiving your cover letter!
